LanguageData.Apparel_Respirator.label: respirator
LanguageData.Apparel_Respirator.description: Respirators filter the air and prevent the user from touching their mouth and nose.
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueDoctorMask.label: plague doctor mask
LanguageData.Apparel_PlagueDoctorMask.description: Plague doctors wore these to protect themselves from getting sick while treating their patients. Not the most effective form of protection, but it's better than nothing.
